name: 3BHK Modern Villa
location_full: Near Kuruvikkoodu, Pala-Ponkunnam Road, Kottayam, Kerala

long_description: This stunning modern villa near Kuruvikkoodu offers the perfect blend of design and comfort. With high-end materials and natural lighting, it's ideal for families seeking peace in a well-connected area.
